title: GameCreated
description: Instructs the matchmaker of a newly created game instance

gameID.description: Unique identifier of the created game

connection_info.description: Information for clients to directly connect to this game

accountID.description: Account identifier of one of the participating players

ip.description: The IP adress of the public facing network interface of the simulator

port.description: The port number of the public facing network interface of the simulator

password.description: The password this selected player must use to connect to this game

spectate_password.description: The password to use for spectating this game with this player's information visible
